--- title: Interactive reporting + visualization with Shiny II subtitle: Lecture 24 title-slide-attributes: data-background-image: ../vizdata-bg.png data-background-size: 800px, cover data-slide-number: none format: revealjs highlight-style: a11y execute: code-link: true warning: true editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- # Warm up ## Announcements - Course and TA evaluations - If we can get to \>=90% participation for both, each person gets +5 points on their lowest (not dropped) homework score. - Current participation rate: TA evals 8.5% and course evals 5.9%. - [Project 1s are posted on the course website](https://vizdata.org/student-work/project-1.html). I will remove the scores from the repos after the semester ends. - Also posted are your [thank you cards](https://vizdata.org/student-work/thank-you.html) and [ugly plots](https://vizdata.org/student-work/ugly-plot.html)! # From last time ## Ultimate goal ::: {.medium .center-align} [https://minecr.shinyapps.io/manager-survey](https://minecr.shinyapps.io/manager-survey/) ::: ::: {.cell} ::: # Interactive reporting with Shiny ## Livecoding ::: task Code along in `manager-survey/app.R`. (Part 2) :::
Highlights: - Data pre-processing outside of the app - Tabsets - Validation # Interactive visualizations with Shiny ## Livecoding ::: task Code along in `manager-survey/app.R`. (Part 3) :::
Highlights: - Conditional panels - Linked brushing ## Reference The code for the app can be found [here](https://github.com/INFO526-DataViz/shiny-ex-2).
